test_description: Verify PostGIS routing algorithm correctly assigns Service Center based on user lat/long within defined polygons
business_risk: Critical - Misrouting leads to SLA breaches and service unavailability
preconditions: Service Centers with defined polygons exist in PostGIS; User address geocoded
test_steps: 1. Define complex polygon for SC-A; 2. Define overlapping polygon for SC-B (different brand); 3. Submit request from coords inside SC-A; 4. Submit request from coords in overlap zone
expected_result: Request 1 routes to SC-A; Request 2 routes based on Brand affinity and Round-Robin logic
success_criteria: Correct SC ID returned; P95 query time < 250ms

test_description: Load test SignalR hub with 10k concurrent technician streams and customer listeners
preconditions: SignalR Service Active; Redis Backplane Active
test_steps: 1. Spin up 5k mock technicians emitting GPS; 2. Spin up 5k mock customers listening; 3. Measure end-to-end latency
expected_result: 95% of location updates delivered within 2 seconds

test_description: Verify offline queue synchronization when network restores
business_risk: High - Data loss for field technicians
preconditions: Technician logged in; Data cached locally
test_steps: 1. Enable Airplane mode; 2. Complete 3 jobs locally; 3. Disable Airplane mode; 4. Verify sync order and data integrity
expected_result: All 3 jobs sync to backend in FIFO order without conflicts
success_criteria: Zero data loss; UI updates correctly
